mapper.select: select merchant_id,merchant_name,merchant_type,merchant_address,merchant_des,merchant_phone,merchant_manager,merchant_role,merchant_password,merchant_account,login_token,login_Invalid_time from merchant where merchant_account = #{merchant_account} and merchant_password = #{merchant_password}
mapper.insert:
insert into merchant(merchant_id,merchant_name,merchant_type,merchant_address,merchant_des,merchant_phone,merchant_manager,merchant_role,merchant_password,merchant_account,login_token,login_Invalid_time) values
(#{entity.merchantId},#{entity.merchantName},#{entity.merchantType},#{entity.merchantAddress},#{entity.merchantDes},#{entity.merchantPhone},#{entity.merchantManager},#{entity.merchantRole},#{entity.merchantPassword},#{entity.merchantAccount},#{entity.loginToken},#{entity.loginInvalidTime})
on duplicate key update merchant_id=values(merchant_id), merchant_name=values(merchant_name), merchant_type=values(merchant_type), merchant_address=values(merchant_address), merchant_des=values(merchant_des), merchant_phone=values(merchant_phone), merchant_manager=values(merchant_manager), merchant_role=values(merchant_role), merchant_password=values(merchant_password), merchant_account=values(merchant_account), login_token=values(login_token), login_Invalid_time=values(login_Invalid_time)
mapper.update:
update merchant
merchant_id = #{merchantId},
merchant_name = #{merchantName},
merchant_type = #{merchantType},
merchant_address = #{merchantAddress},
merchant_des = #{merchantDes},
merchant_phone = #{merchantPhone},
merchant_manager = #{merchantManager},
merchant_role = #{merchantRole},
merchant_password = #{merchantPassword},
merchant_account = #{merchantAccount},
login_token = #{loginToken},
login_Invalid_time = #{loginInvalidTime},
where merchant_id = #{merchantId}
